Big Dream
AngelGirl Token was dreamed up in Nov. 2021 with the goal of becoming a decentralized community focused meme project with true purpose.
Buy token Live chart

About AGT

ShitFace Inu’s mission is to bring new cryptocurrency concepts to mainstream investors. Unlike older, comparable projects, $SFINU introduces holders to next-generation concepts such as Staking & Farming, NFTs with utility and rewards and more.

A BEP20 (BSC) meme token that promotes healthy and widespread growth and usage through the ecosystem built around the $SFINU brand as well as specific rewards linked to users’ transactions involving decentralized wallets and other utilities such as staking and farming.

Our NFTs

Token

  • Development

    1% of all transactions will be used to expand the infrastructure and development of the CatBoy project.

  • Liquidity

    2% of every sell will be added to liquidity to create an ever-increasing price floor.

  • Marketing

    6% of all transactions are used for marketing expenses to establish the project more globally.

  • Team

    2% of all transactions benefit the team. The CatBoy project is community driven project, the team will be compensated for the leadership, planning, coordination and execution.

Development roadmap

  • Phase 1
    • New Website
    • New Logo
    • Contract Creation
    • Community Building
    • New Whitepaper
  • Phase 2
    • Profile Picture NFT Presale
    • Launch our token on Pancakeswap
    • NFT Chibies release on Dapp
    • NFT Trading Cards (Mystery Box)
    • Staking Platform
    • Release Marketplace
  • Phase 3
    • Bigger Community
    • Partnerships
    • Exclusive Catboy Merchandise
    • Cat Donation
    • Exchange Listings
    • Certik Audit
  • Longterm Vision
    • Play to Earn Game
    • CatBoy Deal Platform
    • Reduce Tax
    • Charity for solving world problem

FAQ

  • How to buy
    • Install Metamask For Chrome Open your Google Chrome and visit metamask.io. Download the MetaMask chrome extension and set up a wallet. On mobile? Get MetaMask's app for Iphone or Android.
    • Add the Binance SmartChain Network to your wallet. Use the Instruction on the Binance Academy.
    • Transfer $BNB to MetaMask
      Transfer $BNB to your new MetaMask wallet from your existing wallet (e.g Trust Wallet, Coinbase, or Binance), or buy $BNB directly within Metamask.
    • Connect To Pancakeswap
      The safest place to buy $CatBoy is on Pancakeswap.
    • Swap $BNB for $CatBoy
      Set your slippage to minimum 12-15% and enter and the amount of $BNB you would like to swap for $CatBoy.
  • What's an NFT?
